description: Silver Valley's newest NON-STRATA rowhome, NO STRATA FEES! This spacious 5-BED home including a 2-bed daylight basement with separate entry; ideal for in-laws, grown kids, or a home office. Enjoy stunning views from your private rooftop deck, a double side-by-side garage (EV Ready), and a large FENCED yard perfect for kids or pets. Quality construction with Hardy Board materials, A/C, and built to BC Energy Step Code for efficiency. Close to parks, schools, daycare & more. Under New home warranty.
